title: Are all minds connected? If so, why aren't we communicating with telepathy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, I do think that the minds are connected through Universal Consciousness and that telepathy is real and possible. I think that it requires the consent of everyone involved and sadly many people simply refuse to acknowledge the possibility of connecting over distance mentally (kind of like how telephones and radio waves were unfathomable 500 years ago). I also think that telepathy requires a lot of study and practice in order to work effectively and it helps if the people doing it are already spiritually enlightened. That said, if telepathy is based on Universal Consciousness, wouldn’t the people using it need to elevate their minds and spirits to the level of Universal Consciousness in order to access the power of telepathic communication? I think that this is a big reason why telepathy is only used by very few people today. Another facet of telepathy to consider is the bond and connection between the souls that are communicating. Communication is always a two way street and psychic communication is no exception.

No, they are not. This is a sort-of-common idea among various folks into “New Age” beliefs or certain types of “metaphysical” beliefs. Note that I say “beliefs” as there is no evidence whatever of this. I’ve pointed out before that since humans comprise but a single species, we do share certain characteristics and behaviors and responses…. What anthropologists call “human nature”. We all have a similar “startle response” for instance. That’s all from ancient survival traits that have been passed on through the process of evolution.

Because all of our minds are not connected, and telepathy is a spiritual belief system which simply does not work. At least, with all due respect to those who believe in it, there is absolutely no meaningful scientific evidence to support it whatsoever. Telepathy - Wikipedia
“Are all minds connected? If so, why aren't we communicating with telepathy?” If all minds were connected, you wouldn’t be asking this question, would you? There you go.

There is no evidence this is so. There was until recently a million dollar prize on offer to anyone who could demonstrate telepathy or other paranormal phenomenon - the award was never claimed. One Million Dollar Paranormal Challenge - Wikipedia
